chara.textHome:
I live in an apartment complex.
Lots of my friends and
other kids live there too.

But with Seika and Mito especially,
we're always together.

We've been playing in the park, chatting,
and whatever for years and years.

Also...I love baking, so I have
them try everything I make!
Though, Mito usually eats almost all of it!

Being together now, in this very moment,
is one big stroke of luck, right?

That's why I think of everyone who wants
to interact with me as irreplaceable.
Yes, it should be okay to say this now...
I think I'm on a roll!
What's this?
It's feels like a fog has cleared!

There's a few tricks when it comes to baking,
but the most important point is
to measure the ingredients!
That's what my mom always says anyway...

I've realized I didn't have all the ingredients
when I was in the middle of baking and
thought, "Maybe this will work?"
only to ruin it in the end a bunch of times.

Putting my own spin on things is fun,
but it's best to follow the recipe.
That's obvious, but it's really important...
Oh! Hi, I'm over here!
Thanks for showing up!
And, um, nice to meet you!

Ah, this is kind of embarrassing!
*Giggle*
Good morning! Sleep well?
You heard my stomach growling?

Ha ha ha, I'm always really hungry
when I wake up.
Well, let's get something to eat!
What do you like to eat for lunch at school?

I can't resist pudding and gelatin
when they have them!
School desserts just feel special, right?

The apartments get really busy around this
time. Kids coming home from school,
people coming back from shopping,
and adults returning from work!

The apartments get busy sometimes,
but if you look outside at night
it feels so quiet.
I really love that feeling.

When I look out at the apartments,
I think about how many different people
are living in this small space.
It gives me a strange feeling.
I walk the path of a Magical Girl...
I can't look away from that fate.
So I have to keep moving forward!
This is literally unknown territory for me.

I'd better be even more careful here,
to make sure I don't get swept away!

You know how there's a cake
called a "madeleine"?

They say it's named after the
first person to make one.
Lots of treats might have a history like that.

There's something about
really big buildings.
Maybe it's how they look?

Of course, I like looking out from
the top of tall buildings like those, too.

I don't really like dark chocolate, so I always
end up choosing milk chocolate instead.
Maybe I'll get a taste for it as I get older?

I used to get yelled at for running up and
down the stairs when I was a kid...
I don't do it anymore!
Unless I'm really late for school, haha.
I love the apartments where I live!

When springtime comes, all the cherry
blossom trees around the buildings bloom.
It looks gorgeous!

I've got a real weakness for whipped cream.
When I make it myself, I can't stop
taking little tastes of it!
But my mom always scolds me...

Our apartment complex has a festival
every summer!

We all decorate together and
set up food stalls.
There's even a Bon Festival dance!

I love making and eating cream puffs!
I like to fill them with custard and
whipped cream together!
Crispy cream puffs are really good too!

I love sweets, but I like other snacks too!
Like squid and dried salmon and scallops!
Oh, and beef jerky!
We have to win...no matter what!
Let's keep it going!
Pheeew! It all turned out a-okay!
Yes! I could tell we'd win!
I think we finished it off nicely!
Hi there! I'm Leila Ibuki!
If you'd like to...I want to be friends!
Sorry for being so forward!
But it's nice to meet you!
Ah! I think I can feel it!
I'm getting stronger!

This is only a feeling,
but I think I just cleared a hurdle!

It's going great!
Keep this up and things
will start coming together!

With Seika, Mito, and all my friends close by,
every day has been so much fun...
It makes me realize just how lucky I am.
I'm always thankful in my heart.

To all the friends who choose
to spend time with me...
It's a really special thing.
